schools.name: Dee-Mack High School
schools.school-summary: Dee-Mack High School, a public school located in Mackinaw, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Deer Creek-Mackinaw Community Unit School District 701.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Deer Creek-Mackinaw Community Unit School District 701
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Dee-Mack Primary/Jr High School
schools.school-summary: Dee-Mack Primary/Jr High School, a public school located in Mackinaw, IL, serves grades PK-3, 7-8 in the Deer Creek-Mackinaw Community Unit School District 701.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Deer Creek-Mackinaw Community Unit School District 701
